outline:
1. cattle, herd, oxen, ox
    1. cattle (generic pl. but sing. in form - coll)
    2. herd (particular one)
    3. head of cattle (individually)
kjv_def: beeve, bull ([phrase] -ock), [phrase] calf, [phrase] cow, great (cattle), [phrase] heifer, herd, kine, ox.
strongs_def: beef cattle or an animal of the ox family of either gender (as used for plowing); collectively, a herd
